channel.title: For Sale on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in For Sale on Ian Wootten

item.title: Out with the Old
item.description: If anyone is interested in puchasing my old computer, I’m getting rid of it. It features: Athlon 2500XP Barton CPU 512Mb 3200 DDR Memory 80Gb 7200RPM Hard Disk Sound Blaster Live Drive 5.1 with Remote Control Sony DVD-ROM LG 52x24x52 CDRW Tyan Tachyon 128Mb G9600Pro (Ati Radeon – fully boxed) 350W Levicom Blue Lit Dual Fan Power Supply (fully boxed) Antec Plusview Case (with side panel) (fully boxed) 17″ Hansol 710D CRT Flat Monitor Logitech Keyboard/Mouse Boxes/driver disks included, but supplied without any operating system (unless you want Ubuntu!
